item.title: CVE-2023-32509|2024-08-02T15:18:37.286Z -- rolf%20van%20gelder -- order%20your%20posts%20manually
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Rolf van Gelder Order Your Posts Manually plugin <= 2.2.5 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-32508|2024-08-02T15:18:37.624Z -- rolf%20van%20gelder -- order%20your%20posts%20manually
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Rolf van Gelder Order Your Posts Manually allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Order Your Posts Manually: from n/a through 2.2.5.
